post:
**We are pleased to announce VZ VPS Hosting plans are now available at Poland!**  :) 

First Sale - double resources - first 50 orders.

<br>

![](https://i.im.ge/2021/10/06/TJy8CM.png "")

<br>
<center>

------------------------------------------

**VPS-VZ ~~0.5GB~~ 1GB Poland** - 

2 x CPU RYZEN
1GB RAM
20GB SSD storage
1TB transfer @ 1Gbps
2 x dedicated IPv4 or IPv6 
$18 per YEAR

[**2 x CPU / 1GB RAM / 20GB SSD / 650GB @ 1Gbps / 2 x IPv4/6 -- $18 per YEAR**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/ovz/?group_id=50&pricing_id=525&coupon=RYZEN.VZ "2 x CPU / 1GB RAM / 20GB SSD / 650GB @ 1Gbps / 2 x IPv4/6 -- $18 per YEAR")

------------------------------------------

2 x CPU RYZEN
4GB RAM
80GB SSD storage
2TB transfer @ 1Gbps

[**2 x CPU / 4GB RAM / 80GB SSD / 2TB @ 1Gbps / 2 x IPv4/6 -- $55 per YEAR**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/ovz/?group_id=50&pricing_id=524&coupon=RYZEN.VZ "2 x CPU / 4GB RAM / 80GB SSD / 2TB @ 1Gbps / 2 x IPv4/6 -- $55 per YEAR")

<br>

> All plans - https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/ovz/?group_id=50
> coupon code - RYZEN.VZ
> .
> **Post your order # to claim double resources.**
> **Justification required for the extra IPv4**
</center>

<br>

**F.A.Q.**

1. Refund policy = 24 hours; minimal transaction fee deducted. 
2. Activation time = Instantly (please turn OFF VPN while order)
3. How to claim = Post order # or make a ticket with billing dept.
4. Support Available = [Support Helpdesk](https://my.webhorizon.in/plugin/support_manager/client_tickets/departments/ "Support Helpdesk") , and [Telegram](https://t.me/WebHorizon "Telegram")
5. **What is hostname / Invalid hostname** = Our system expects hostname in domain format, it can be a dummy domain. for example - sample.com
6. Support TUN/TAP, FUSE. IPGRE? = YES

<br>

Payment Methods =

Crypto payments (no extra fee using CoinPayments)
Card Payments (Stripe processor)
Paypal Payments 

<br>

Host Specs - 
Powerful RYZEN CPU (Gen 2 / Gen 3)
2 x 1TB NVMe/SSD
64GB DD4 RAM
Full 1Gbps port speed - [**Looking glass speed test**](http://waw.lg.webhorizon.in/ "**Looking glass speed test**")


<br>

Thanks!
